zh.title: 澳元/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，面临关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前澳元/美元（AUD/USD）交易在0.64913附近，表现出一定的震荡整理特征。日内高点为0.64975，低点为0.64908，显示出市场缺乏方向性。短期内，价格在此区间内波动，可能受到市场情绪和经济数据的影响。

从技术指标来看，MACD处于负值区域，表明短期内卖方占优，趋势可能偏向下行。不过，由于目前缺乏RSI数据，无法全面评估超买或超卖的状态。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在0.65055处，进一步确认了当前的下行压力。

支撑位方面，0.6490是一个关键的支撑水平，如果价格有效跌破，将可能引发更强的下行趋势。阻力位则在0.6500附近，若价格回升至该水平之上，可能会引发买盘兴趣。因此，交易者应密切关注这两个关键价位，以制定相应的交易策略。

在当前市场环境下，建议短线交易者考虑在接近支撑位时寻找买入机会，止损设置在支撑位下方。同时，若价格反弹至阻力位附近，可以考虑短期卖出，以捕捉潜在的回调风险。整体而言，保持灵活应对是当前交易策略的关键。

en.title: Australian Dollar vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The AUD/USD pair currently trades at 0.64913, hovering near recent lows. This price action suggests a bearish sentiment in the market, especially as the pair has failed to maintain momentum above the 20-day simple moving average (SMA) of 0.65055. The high of 0.64975 and low of 0.64908 over the past 24 hours indicate a tight range, reflecting indecision among traders. A sustained break below the recent low could signal further downside potential, while a move above the SMA might indicate a potential reversal.

In terms of technical indicators, the MACD value of -0.00098 suggests a bearish momentum, although the absence of a signal line makes it difficult to draw definitive conclusions. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is not available, but monitoring this indicator when it becomes accessible will be crucial for assessing overbought or oversold conditions. A lower RSI could indicate that the pair is oversold, presenting a potential buying opportunity, while an RSI above 70 would suggest caution.

Support levels for AUD/USD can be observed around 0.6480, which, if breached, could lead to further selling pressure. Resistance is expected near the 0.6500 level, where previous selling has occurred. Traders should keep an eye on these levels, as they can serve as critical decision points. A failure to break through resistance could solidify the bearish trend, while a successful rally might prompt a short-covering rally.

In terms of trading strategies, a conservative approach would involve waiting for confirmation of a breakout from the established range. A sell order could be placed below 0.6480 with a stop-loss just above this level, while a buy order above the 0.6505 SMA would allow traders to capitalize on potential bullish momentum. Keeping abreast of economic indicators and geopolitical developments will also be essential for making informed trading decisions in this volatile currency pair.
